# Preface {-}

<div style="text-align: right;">
"Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability." <br>
William Osler (1849-1919).
</div>

Biostatistics is the science of managing medical uncertainty. Biostatistical methods play a key role in the scientific assessment of the three main areas of medical practice:
- Diagnosis
- Treatment
- Prognosis

<div style="text-align: right;">
  Leonhard Held

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      cache = FALSE, 
                      fig.align = 'center')

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  todo = function(text) {
    if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
      sprintf('<div class="todo">%s</div>', text)
    } else if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
      sprintf('\\todo{%s}', text)
    } else {
      text
    }
  }
)
```
